title: 'A completely new manufacturing frontier': Space Forge fires up 1st commercial semiconductor factory in space
full_text: 'A completely new manufacturing frontier': Space Forge fires up 1st commercial semiconductor factory in space. Such experiments have previously only been conducted aboard the International Space Station.. In-orbit manufacturing start-up Space Forge has produced its first plasma in orbit aboard the ForgeStar-1 satellite. It's a world first and a major step toward the company's vision of making novel se… [+3019 chars]
